entry.title: The video that got this man JAILED for 18 months

media:group.media:title: The video that got this man JAILED for 18 months
media:group.media:description:
***The Day after I uploaded this video, Youtube censored it as 18 over. This has in effect killed all traffic too it. There is nothing in this video that could be consider 'adult' in nature. I have appealed the decision.***
Louis Duxberry, 22, jailed for saying the wrong thing on Facebook. A frightening expose on Britain's thought police and our oppressive hate crime laws.
